text: Bukalapak is an online marketplace in Indonesia, owned and run by PT. Bukalapak. == History == Bukalapak was founded by Achmad Zaky in early 2010 as a digital agency division named Suitmedia, based in Jakarta.Long Overdue E-Commerce Group BukaLapak Finally Supports Online Payment DailySocial, 28 Agustus 2012 However, Bukalapak has only been a Limited Liability Company (PT) in September 2011 and is managed by management led by Achmad Zaky as CEO (Chief Executive Office) and Nugroho Herucahyono as CTO (Chief Technology Officer). == Users == In one day, Bukalapak visited more than 2 million visits. Until now, Bukalapak has 7 million sold by users (as of December 2015) and is in position 11 major sites in Indonesia based on Alexa.Bukalapak Site Info Alexa == References == Category:2010 establishments in Asia Category:21st-century establishments in Indonesia Category:Websites
title: Bukalapak
